entry.title: Exclusive
entry.summary:
Author: wisteriaglow

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,717Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 139

Summary: Newly single and in an odd place since the breakup, Clark is dragged by Lois to Gotham's most glamorous party. He expects to feel out of place and awkwardly get by, not to steal a kiss from Gotham's resident elusive billionaire, Bruce Wayne. Sparks fly and what starts off as a fling spirals into something more...but nothing is as easy as it seems, especially when Metropolis' resident billionaire is working hard to get his fiancée back.ORClark and Bruce start something after connecting on a night at a party, but Lex doesn't let go so easily.

entry.title: Bring Me To Life Again
entry.summary:
Author: iloveyaoibtw

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,281Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 16

Summary: His heartbeat stayed steady. Good. Because Bruce had never felt a flutter for anything. Clark forced down the seizing pain in his chest, lingering at the doorway for just a few seconds, knowing those deep blue eyes he had drowned in too long were watching him. Watching him carefully. As if, if he lingered even a little longer, he’d break and go back. The distance from him to Bruce was only seven steps.

entry.title: Temptation is One Hell of a Thing
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,925Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Bruce Wayne never expected to walk into a church again—let alone with his four-year-old son in his arms. But when a meeting with Clark Kent, a priest. It turns into more than polite conversation, Bruce finds himself disarmed by a man who shouldn’t have surprised him at all. Clark is broad-shouldered, and impossibly kind; a believer in things Bruce turned his back on the day of his parents’ funeral.Bruce is skeptical, Clark is steadfast. Their ideologies clash from the moment they sit across from one another: billionaire pragmatism versus the faith of a priest. But somewhere between coloring books at Clark’s desk and quiet invitations to community fairs, a dangerous warmth grows. Bruce doesn’t know how to name it, and Clark doesn’t dare.Because whatever is happening between them—it shouldn’t. Bruce pushes, searching for the language he can’t bring himself to say aloud, while Clark whispers what he shouldn’t confess at all: I can’t. A vow binds him to the Church, but his heart betrays him in every secret meeting, every glance held too long.It shouldn’t work. It can’t work. But it does. And as much Clark Kent prays, temptation seeps through.

entry.title: Come As You Are
entry.summary:
Author: everyonethinkstoomuch

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,491Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 78

Summary: 'Bruce was only watching to see how Clark’s sparring was coming along... He wasn’t watching Clark because he liked him or found him attractive. That would be foolish, and not sensible at all, and a distraction from the more important things in life, like beating up criminals every night and passing his exams.'When Clark Kent gets into yet another fight on a night out, his friend Diana suggests he joins the university boxing club to get used to fighting back, without killing someone with his superpowers. Bruce Wayne has just transferred to Metropolis City University and isn’t all too happy about it. Unlike everyone else he knows, he misses Gotham. And now he has to balance university, being Batman, and his feelings for Clark Kent - which he definitely doesn’t have.CONTENT WARNINGS: a little bit of swearing, implied abuse, implied & described mild violence, lots of discussion of dead parents.This is an AU drawing on several different versions of characters and also my own interpretation of them. Bruce is Battinson, Clark is Corensupes & Smallville. The others are a mix of all media types and kind of just what I want them to be!

entry.title: I've Got All This Ringing In My Ears And None On My Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: saintsforgrrrls

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,348Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 150

Summary: Music matches your soul. Bruce hates his own tune while Clark finds it as the most beautiful thing to bless his ears.-----Hal’s hand mocked him, his thumb and the rest of his fingers imitating John’s mouth. “Big Blue’s Kryptonian traditional crystal music. That’s a mouthful. Princess, over there, has a crazy opera gig going on.” He explained, pointing at everyone who stood around the Green Lanterns.Barry and Bruce were the outliers, choosing to continue sitting at the table. Or rather, Bruce was sitting in the chair while Barry sat on top of the large circular table near him while emitting his music. He didn’t want to be mean and leave Bruce at the table by himself.“Fish boy has a whole...whale? Which is crazy considering he already controls most of the ocean so the sound is really on the nose-“ Hal began to ramble off to himself, absentmindedly waving his hand as he motioned John to continue it for him.

entry.title: Despite everything, it’s still you
entry.summary:
Author: VettTrece

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,115Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 232

Summary: Bruce Wayne, lonely, distrustful, and worn down by a city that never changes, witnesses the impossible: a man flies in front of him, no wires, no tricks, no logical explanation. Superman has arrived. Not as the man from Bruce's world, but as a figure who shouldn’t have crossed the threshold.He hails from a different universe, one with different rules. A place where, according to his logic, Bruce is meant to be his soulmate.But in this Gotham, there is no destiny, there is no hope. In his home there's no room for myths.Until now.

entry.title: Like Sunshine After Rain
entry.summary:
Author: vela (volamena)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,941Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 139

Summary: Bruce’s fingers shift around Clark's bicep as if feeling for something. Clark watches as a myriad of emotions flutter through Bruce’s eyes, from suspicion to surprise to concern to suspicion again. Clark doesn’t know what to make of that. Did Bruce Wayne just…feel him up?“Er, Mr. Wayne?”Bruce retracts his hand like he's been burned. He shifts back into position, as if returning to his baseline state after mentally filing away some information. “I apologize, Mr. Kent. Thank you for your time today. Alfred will escort you out. Please have a safe trip back to Metropolis.”Now it’s Clark’s turn to stare at him. “Uh…right. Have a good night, Mr. Wayne.” Bruce just stares back.Yeah, Clark decides, Bruce Wayne is weird.

entry.title: crushing
entry.summary:
Author: crimsonvelocity

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,058Chapters: 8/25Kudos: 69

Summary: "Whatever happened in Metropolis three months ago- I need you to wrap it up. It makes you a goddamn liability.""You think I don't know that?" Clark's voice is hoarse. Low. "You think I wanted this to happen?"Dark eyes watch Clark."I'm not trying to be your weak link, Batman. I'm trying to survive it."
